title: Immersive Microlearning for Enhancing Digital Literacy Through STEAM-Based Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Language Education Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening innovative instructional design capabilities for language professionals through systemic thinking and ethical digital technology integration

learning_goals: Learners can design a plan integrating technological elements into language learning scenarios using the STEAM education framework
Learners can develop culturally contextualized language education content using immersive learning tools (AR/VR, simulations)
Learners can establish criteria for evaluating ethical considerations (data privacy, accessibility) when applying digital technology
Learners can write a report analyzing the social impact of language education (diversity, inclusion) by applying a systems thinking approach

resources: Metaverse Environment Template for Language Learning

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
